dcterms:creator: Christian Jacobsen
Yilin Zhuang
Karthik Duraisamy
dcterms:description: A dataset containing pairs of permeability fields and pressure distributions generated by solving the 2D Darcy flow equations, used for training and validation of models in fluid flow through porous media.
dcterms:title: Darcy flow dataset

dcterms:creator: François Mazé
Faez Ahmed
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 30,000 optimized structures generated through topology optimization using the SIMP method, aimed at maximizing mechanical stiffness under various constraints.
dcterms:title: SIMP dataset

dcterms:creator: Yinhao Zhu
Nicholas Zabaras
dcterms:description: A training and validation dataset for Darcy flow problems, used to develop Bayesian deep convolutional encoder-decoder networks for surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification.
dcterms:title: Training and validation dataset for Darcy flow
